findings.title: Block values as a proxy for time
findings.description: Uses a dangerous comparison for `block.timestamp` and `startTime`. Using block.timestamp is insecure and should be duly avoided to prevent unforeseen errors and problems.

findings.title: A Floating Pragma is Set
findings.description: The compiler version should be a fixed one to avoid undiscovered compiler bugs.

findings.title: SafeMath Override
findings.description: The SafeMath library is no longer needed starting Solidity v0.8+ and should be removed to save gas as the compiler now has built-in overflow checking.
